mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(A.TOBE_CD, #{originCd}) FROM MARKET_DATA_MAP A WHERE A.ID = #{marketDataId} AND A.ORIGIN_CD = #{originCd}

SELECT A.PAY_RCV_CD, A.LEG_TYPE_CD, IF(A.COUPON_IRC_CD1 = '', NULL, A.COUPON_IRC_CD1) AS COUPON_IRC_CD1, IF(A.COUPON_IRC_CD2 = '', NULL, A.COUPON_IRC_CD2) AS COUPON_IRC_CD2, IF(A.COUPON_IRC_CD3 = '', NULL, A.COUPON_IRC_CD3) AS COUPON_IRC_CD3, B.IRC_CD AS LEG_IRC_CD, C.IRC_CD AS DISC_IRC_CD FROM PRODUCT_LEG A, IRC_INFO B, (SELECT BB.IRC_CD FROM PRODUCT_INFO AA, IRC_INFO BB WHERE AA.CCY_CD = BB.CCY_CD AND AA.INSTRUMENT_CD = #{instrumentCd} AND BB.ISRISKFREE = 'Y') C WHERE A.INSTRUMENT_CD = #{instrumentCd} AND A.CCY_CD = B.CCY_CD AND B.ISRISKFREE = 'Y'
SELECT CCY_CD FROM IRC_INFO WHERE IRC_CD = #{ircCd};
SELECT IRC_CD FROM IRC_INFO WHERE CCY_CD = #{ccyCd} AND ISRISKFREE = 'Y';

SELECT RCVLEG.COUPON_IRC_CD1 AS R_COUPON_IRC_CD1, RCVLEG.COUPON_IRC_CD2 AS R_COUPON_IRC_CD2, RCVLEG.COUPON_IRC_CD3 AS R_COUPON_IRC_CD3, PAYLEG.COUPON_IRC_CD1 AS P_COUPON_IRC_CD1, PAYLEG.COUPON_IRC_CD2 AS P_COUPON_IRC_CD2, PAYLEG.COUPON_IRC_CD3 AS P_COUPON_IRC_CD3, DISCLEG.IRC_CD AS DISC_IRC_CD FROM (SELECT INSTRUMENT_CD, COUPON_IRC_CD1, COUPON_IRC_CD2, COUPON_IRC_CD3 FROM PRODUCT_LEG WHERE PAY_RCV_CD = 'P') PAYLEG, (SELECT INSTRUMENT_CD, COUPON_IRC_CD1, COUPON_IRC_CD2, COUPON_IRC_CD3 FROM PRODUCT_LEG WHERE PAY_RCV_CD = 'R') RCVLEG, (SELECT A.INSTRUMENT_CD, B.IRC_CD FROM PRODUCT_INFO A, IRC_INFO B WHERE A.CCY_CD = B.CCY_CD AND B.ISRISKFREE = 'Y') DISCLEG WHERE PAYLEG.INSTRUMENT_CD = RCVLEG.INSTRUMENT_CD AND PAYLEG.INSTRUMENT_CD = DISCLEG.INSTRUMENT_CD AND PAYLEG.INSTRUMENT_CD = #{instrumentCd}

SELECT C.FACTOR_CD, C.IR, C.TYPE, A.DAY_COUNT_CONVENTION, A.COMPOUND_FREQUENCY, A.CCY_CD, B.MRTY_CD FROM IRC_INFO A, IR_INFO B, IR_DATA C, SYS_CD_MAP D WHERE A.IRC_CD = B.IRC_CD AND B.FACTOR_CD = C.FACTOR_CD AND A.IRC_CD = #{ircCd} AND C.DT = #{dt} AND D.SRC_CD = B.MRTY_CD ORDER BY D.CD

SELECT A.VERTEX1, A.VERTEX2, A.VOL, B.CCY_CD, B.DCF, E.CNT FROM VOL_SURFACE_DATA A, VOL_SURFACE_INFO B, SYS_CD_MAP C, SYS_CD_MAP D, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM VOL_SURFACE_DATA AA, VOL_SURFACE_INFO BB WHERE AA.DT = #{dt} AND AA.VOL_SURFACE_CD = BB.VOL_SURFACE_CD AND BB.CCY_CD = #{ccyCd} GROUP BY VERTEX2 LIMIT 1) E WHERE A.DT = #{dt} AND A.VOL_SURFACE_CD = B.VOL_SURFACE_CD AND B.CCY_CD = #{ccyCd} AND C.TYPE = '002' AND C.SRC_CD = A.VERTEX1 AND D.SRC_CD = A.VERTEX2 ORDER BY D.CD, C.CD

SELECT B.PAY_RCV_CD, B.LEG_TYPE_CD, A.CCY_CD AS BASE_CCY, B.CCY_CD AS REFERENCE_CCY, CASE WHEN A.CCY_CD = B.CCY_CD THEN 1 ELSE (SELECT CC.VALUE FROM FX_DATA CC WHERE A.CCY_CD = CC.CCY_CD1 AND B.CCY_CD = CC.CCY_CD2) END AS VALUE FROM PRODUCT_INFO A, PRODUCT_LEG B WHERE A.INSTRUMENT_CD = B.INSTRUMENT_CD AND A.INSTRUMENT_CD = #{instrumentCd} AND B.PAY_RCV_CD = #{payRcvCd}
SELECT C.MRTY_CD AS MRTY_CD, D.VOL AS VOL FROM VOL_INFO C, VOL_DATA D WHERE C.CCY_CD = #{ccyCd} AND C.FACTOR_CD = D.FACTOR_CD
